channel.title: PI Item switching
channel.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mCvTq0UqUy4&feature=player_embedded
I looked under itemassistant, couldnt seem to fix it their. If anyone know where to look to make it so that the item doesnt go back to the top row of the inventory.

item.title: PI Item switching
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

  1. obtain the SLOT of the item you clicked on (look into your packets)
  2. REPLACE the item in that slot by the item youâ€™re wielding (or make a return; if the player is wielding nothing in that slot).
